verbose_text: However, the effect of LZK overexpression appeared to " spill over " to other astrocytes : although only a relatively small subset of astrocytes (~ 13%) in GFAP-CreER T2; LZK OE mice overexpressed LZK, as assessed by expression of its reporter tdT, GFAP was systemically upregulated throughout the CNS, even in the absence of an injury or other insult.
